# canplr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Tools for Working with Canadian Premier League Centre Circle Data provided by 
CPL in partnership with Stats Perform.

You can get the data here: <https://canpl.ca/centre-circle-data/>

## Installation

You can install the development version of canplr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("wozniar/canplr")
```
